topic: Mind-bending physics facts that will change how you see reality
title: The Reality Shift: 5 Physics Facts That Will Blow Your Mind
description: Get ready for a journey through the fascinating realm of physics.

beat1: Imagine you're on a train, heading to your destination.
But suddenly, it screeches to a halt.
You're 300 meters away from where you were just minutes ago.
beat2: What's happening? Is time lost or something more?
Let's explore the strange world of quantum entanglement.
beat3: Classical mechanics vs. quantum mechanics: which reality is 'real'?
beat4: A comparison that will leave you questioning everything.
beat5: So, which reality is real? Is it our everyday lives?

scene_descriptions.visual: A person standing on a train track, looking confused.
The train's clock stopped at an odd time.
A split-screen comparison of classical and quantum mechanics.
You're back on the train track, looking relieved but still puzzled.
